tool_description: Hourly collected Twitter trending topics of 65 countries & 500 locations available as daily downloads.
name: Twitter Trending Topics Archive
title: Twitter Trending Topics Archive

api_list.name: /download
api_list.description: Takes a country code and a date and returns a URL to download corresponding Twitter trending topics archive file in CSV format.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country code for the trends to be downloaded. Leave blank for global trends.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date of the trends to be returned in YYYY-MM-DD format; must be equal to or later than 2017-09-03. If not provided, the latest available hourly trend file of the current date will be returned.
